name: outro
commands: Guys, look.|That pillar's got all sorts of strange symbols on it.
It's got a strange tome sitting on it.|Do you think this is the cause of the events here?
Hmm...interesting|Very interesting.|By the looks of it, it seems that this tome here was the catalyst for the events that happened here.
Hold on, what just happened and what do you mean by catalyst?
The seals on this tome aren't very effective.|The recent battle must've disturbed them.|Luckily, it only seemed to blow up those monsters.
This tome feeds off the intent of others.|It can cause the malice in people to rise thereby creating chaos.|Take a look of the bodies, or at least what's left of them.
They've got sword marks. And they look man-made.
So what you're saying is that there used to infighting here.|But how would the tome be here in the first place?
What is it? Perhaps it could be related.
Well a few days ago...|a strange fellow had come by our town claiming to have a gift for our Lord.
I have come bearing a gift.
May I ask who you are?
Of course, I am Lyon and I have come on the behalf of my master, the Acolyte Lilith.
I will have to reject this gift.
Please hear me out m'Lord.|This tome holds tremendous power, it will prove useful to you.|My master wishes to make friends.
Even more reason to reject it I'm afraid.

But what if I told you this tome can prevent monster attacks?|Alongside its tremendous power.|Think about it, you will be lauded by your people.|They will come to appreciate the safety of your city and no one would dare usurp your rule...
So Lord Seth had taken the tome....
Probably, but...what happened with the Lord?
There had been discontent lately due to disagreements between the City Council.|The tome caused panic within the dissenters.
Yes...conflict had started.|The tome had absorbed those feelings and well...|Perhaps by the time they realized it, it was already too late.
They tried to contain it however...they didn't have a light user.|Hm.......
Here MC, take this tome with you.

Yes, you.|You can use light magic so you're resistant to its malice.|This tome can pack quite the punch. It'll be quite a boon for you.|Want it? If not, I'll safeguard it to prevent further incidents.|Take some time to think about it while I examine this pillar further.
Hey...I don't fully understand this magic but...|All this talk about corruption and disaster...|This sounds like a terrible thing to bring with us.
I agree with Senya.|It's caused this whole place to ruins.|Who knows what that Lilith was planning? If she knew we were coming here...|Who's to say we're walking right into her trap?
Even so, I'm immune to its effects. What if this power can help us defeat that necromancer?
I don't think it's worth the risk.|It's not that we don't want to defeat the mage...|your safety should come first.
And its not immunity. It's resistance. We don't know anything else about this tome.|It might be powerful, but I think it's more trouble than its worth.
Senya and Schuri didn't like that you took the tome -1 both
I think it's worth the risk. We can use the power to defeat that necromancer.|They were stronger than Teach, so any power boost would be helpful.
MC...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
Don't make us worry, got it?
Senya and Schuri liked that you didn't take the tome +1 both
This tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.
Alright, that take cares of that.
Oh thank the Spirits.|For a split second I thought that creepy book would have to come with us.
That's a relief! There's no need for such a risk.
Hey! Let's head back to town now. Best not to linger here.|Who knows what else might be hiding here.
